Ayatollah Khomeini

Author: Edward Willett
Publisher: New York : Rosen Pub. Group, 2004.
Series: Middle East leaders.
Edition/Format:  Print book : Biography : Elementary and junior high school : English : 1st edView all editions and formats
Summary:

Examines the life and leadership skills of Ayatollah Khomeini, who established the "ideal Islamic state" in Iran and encouraged Muslims worldwide to demonstrate against non-Islamic nations.
Rating:

(not yet rated) 0 with reviews - Be the first.

Subjects
  • Khomeini, Ruhollah -- Juvenile literature.
  • Khomeini, Ruhollah.
  • Heads of state -- Iran -- Biography -- Juvenile literature.

Examines the life and leadership skills of Ayatollah Khomeini, who established the "ideal Islamic state" in Iran and encouraged Muslims worldwide to demonstrate against non-Islamic nations.
